text: Photo - Illustration : Maya Robinson / Vulture and Netflix The House of Cards writers were in the middle of crafting the final chapters of the show ’ s operatic showdown between President Claire Underwood and her estranged husband, former President Frank Underwood, when their real world collapsed. Co - showrunners Melissa James Gibson, Frank Pugliese, and the show ’ s five writers had been convening at their New York office since June 2017. They had finished writing 9 episodes and outlined 11 out of the 13 overall. While they hadn ’ t figured out how exactly the epic power battle between Claire ( Robin Wright ) and Frank ( Kevin Spacey ) would conclude, they were close.
